statements: CREATE TABLE PersonalFinanceTransactions (transaction_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, description TEXT, amount DECIMAL, date DATE);
CREATE TABLE users ( user_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE NOT NULL, password VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL )
CREATE TABLE users (id INT PRIMARY KEY, name STRING, email STRING, budget DECIMAL)
CREATE TABLE users (id INT PRIMARY KEY, name STRING, email STRING, date_of_birth DATE)
CREATE TABLE accounts (account_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT REFERENCES users(id), account_type STRING, balance DECIMAL(10, 2)
CREATE TABLE transactions (transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY, account_id INT REFERENCES accounts(account_id), transaction_type STRING, amount DECIMAL(10, 2), transaction_date DATE)
CREATE TABLE users (id INT PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(50), email VARCHAR(50))
CREATE TABLE accounts (id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT, account_name VARCHAR(50), balance DECIMAL(10, 2))
CREATE TABLE transactions (id INT PRIMARY KEY, account_id INT, transaction_type VARCHAR(10), amount DECIMAL(10, 2), date TIMESTAMP)
